title: Whistle for Willie
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Mal Wittman
brief_description: The story of a little boy trying to learn how to whistle for his dog the way the older boys do is told in lovely simple words and beautiful glowing pictures. The minimal animation adds beauty to Ezra Jack Keats’ cut-paper illustrations. Story teller: Jane Harvey. From the book written and illustrated by Ezra Jack Keates.
